title: Game wont start
body: Whenever I try to start a game, it doesn't load it, a reconnect button appears and when I click it, it only makes the sound.

replies.body: Failing to reconnect can be caused by a blocked or unstable connection that can't get back to the game server.  My advice would be to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I tried using repair tool kit, reinstalling 3 times, and it still wouldn't even let me join a game, I enter queue, but when the timer runs out for the game to start, I enter the page with only the reconnect button, and the only option I have left it to close client
Hextech Repair Tool wouldn't solve this particular issue, you'd need to perform the steps listed in the article Porocles linked.

Agreed with Rineyy here, reinstalling can help repair game files but not your connection to the game servers.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the fix!
